means: （使）腐烂，腐朽( decay的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The bodies buried in the fine ash slowly decayed.
sentence.Network_cn: 埋在灰烬里的尸体慢慢地腐烂了。

sentence.Network_en: New Shoreham, now sadly decayed, has barely 100 inhabitants.
sentence.Network_cn: 如今已经衰落的新肖勒姆仅有100名居民,很令人伤感.

sentence.Network_en: The place stank of decayed fish.

衰减时间（decay time）参数设定了当信号低于阀值时，声音淡出的时间。 音头时间（attack time）参数工作在与上面衰减参数相反 …

entry.tran: (尸体或死去的植物）腐烂，腐朽，腐败;(牙齿）遭蛀蚀
entry.def: When something such as a dead body, a dead plant, or a tooth decays, it is gradually destroyed by a natural process.

example.ex: The bodies buried in the fine ash slowly decayed...
example.tran: 埋在灰烬里的尸体慢慢地腐烂了。

example.ex: The ground was scattered with decaying leaves.

entry.tran: (社会、制度、机构等）衰败，衰退，衰落
entry.def: If something such as a society, system, or institution decays, it gradually becomes weaker or its condition gets worse.

example.ex: Popular cinema seems to have decayed...
example.tran: 大众电影似乎已经衰落了。

example.ex: Congress has tried dozens of approaches to revitalize decaying urban and rural areas.
example.tran: 国会已试行过数十种方法来重振正在走向衰败的城乡地区。

means.word_mean: 2. damaged by decay; hence unsound and useless;

auth_sentence.content: How could the foundations have decayed so quickly?
auth_sentence.res_content: How could the foundations have decayed so quickly?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How could the foundations have decayed so quickly?

auth_sentence.content: Inside were the badly decayed remains of a year-old baby.
auth_sentence.res_content: Inside were the badly decayed remains of a year-old baby.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Inside were the badly decayed remains of a year-old baby.

auth_sentence.content: The two turbines decayed, halving the power they produced.
auth_sentence.res_content: The two turbines decayed, halving the power they produced.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The two turbines decayed, halving the power they produced.

sentences.en: Some of her teeth were very badly decayed.
sentences.cn: 她有些牙齿烂得很厉害。

sentences.en: The place stank of decayed fish.
